comment: Love and support your race, my white brothers and sisters. Whites (European-descended peoples) are only % of the world's population. We have the right to exist and the right to our own ethno-states.

comment: You dummies keep crying about "the right to love your own race". You have a gazillion ways to do that, starting with Irish clubs, Italian clubs, German clubs, Greek clubs, etc etc. There are parades all over the country every year. Greeks aren't the same race as Germans, etc.
